entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You received a basic location of Bera Jeza's work. This might be a good place to start.
entries.journal_entry_description: Find clues that will assist in finding Bera Jeza's killer.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Speak with Happer of the Mos Eisley Police.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Identify the body as Bera Jeza
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: You have a little bit of new information to give to Bib Fortuna.
